ygData.msgSnippet: ahh yes, please, everybody repost all information from other sources here, and please contiue to not read the patch notices when logging in, then ask someone
ygData.messageBody:
ahh yes, please, everybody repost all information from other sources here, and please contiue to not read the patch notices when logging in, then ask someone to spell it out in detail here, that should acomplish a lot.

>>> "Joseph E. Nisse" <nisse@...> 6.8.99 12:14:17 PM >>>

and any other mailing list

--Telaren
